name: Nodino.CC - Embedded Wireless 802.15.4
short_description: This project is about enhancing user experience in wireless 802.15.4 chips through open source programmer, bootloader, flashing over the air, and viral flashing over WSN. Current development is done over CC2430 and STM32.
